title: DIGITALTUTORS PROCEDURAL RIGGING WITH PYTHON IN MAYA TUTORIAL
description:
PROCEDURAL RIGGING WITH PYTHON IN MAYA [ENGLISH]

In this Maya tutorial, we'll learn how to accelerate making
rigs and build them procedurally using a script
Using Python, we'll tackle rigging a Komodo dragon model
which was kindly provided by Kaan Kucuk. By the end of this
Maya training, you'll have a solid understanding of a
typical rigging workflow used in high profile productions
and how to make a clean and stable rig in shorter time
compared to manual methods
